text: Enywe Abasuubili mulakhola okhuba ebesikwa benyu Abandu balali ninanyu tawe. Shibalalekha okhubakholela obubii tawe. Bayanza okhulola akamunyasia. Imalile okhumanyikha isila yabu khuminwa chiabu, ne kabafisanga mubilifu biabu ni amakhongo muno. Khumalile okhulolosilia ebimanyisio nimuba toto nimuretsanga mubwongo
